title: Firecracker jinx 1350??
body: wasn't it meant to be on sale for 975 for a bit ;_; ?

replies.body: Yeah, definitely a mistake for OCE only. Other regions have it at 975 RP. You can check the official Lunar Revel 2015 page (http://promo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/lunar-revel-2015/#skins), where it says for the Firecracker Jinx skin: "1350 RP (975 RP until 23:59 PST on February 16".
yea but they will prob fix In a day wait till then if you already bought look to get rp back. Im sure they will if you ask nicely
All other regions have it discounted so I think it's not meant to be 1350 right now. Been waiting so long for it as well seeing as she is my main -.-

Yes it is a mistake, you guys obviously didn't get the glitchy popup that i was lucky to read. It came up with an error as i tried to buy jinx and it said please check below as we've fixed the price (something along those lines anyway)
riot prob didnt think we would pick up on it

It has to be a mistake. I'm going to hold on to my money through Lunar Revel until we get some word on it. If it does go to the planned sale price, I really hope they give refunds to the people who bought it already...
I agree, I thought there was supposed to be a promotion special on as well.
